mapper.update: update tbl_column set nickname = #{nickname}, title = #{title} , content = #{content} where seq_column = #{seq_column}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_column LEFT OUTER join (select * from files where profile =1) using(seq_column) order by seq_column desc
select count(*) from tbl_column where ${checkOption} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select * from( select row_number() over(order by seq_column desc) rank, a.* from (select * from tbl_column WHERE ${checkOption} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) a ) LEFT OUTER join (select * from tbl_column_file where profile = 1) using(seq_column) where rank between #{startRange} and #{endRange} order by rank asc
